I have taken on a recent project with a retired Falcon 500 motor from my team, however I need a new motor output shaft. Is there a team that has an extra one that I could have? I would be more than happy to pay for shipping and other incurred costs. See attached picture for the piece I am talking about. If it also has the pin and shaft collar, that would be amazing!
